name: Dragon Defender (SuperiorFunTime)
description:
It's like a tower defense, except you're a dragon. (V 0.1.5-- 12/18/2016)

This was my first ever attempt at making a game-- I gave myself one week and this is the concept / design that I came up with. It is scalar and able to have levels added / designed quite easily. This game was designed using the free version of the Construct 2 engine, and utilized all 100 functions. (the reason the game is not larger, or more in depth.)

I hope you guys enjoy, as I really enjoyed making this game. Sadly I do not have the funds to continue development, so this game cannot currently be expanded

Concept and art ©2016-2019

Contact Information: superiorfuntime@gmail.com

Programs used: Construct 2 (https://www.scirra.com/construct2), Pyxel Edit (http://www.pyxeledit.com/)
